name: San Xing Dui(三星堆)
description: This is a click , Roguelike game inspired by China's Sanxingdui culture. Players can use the left mouse button to attack and the right mouse button to upgrade to unlock the entire Sanxingdui，After entering the game, you will use the mouse to control the movement of 5 NPCs. The NPCs you control are white and in contact with enemies, a battle will occur. You need to calculate the number of NPCs you have and their attack power. After defeating the enemy, you can right-click to obtain new NPCs. Through this method, the number of NPCs you control will increase, and you will be able to defeat stronger enemies, The trick of this game is to search for and eliminate fewer enemies than oneself in every battle;
